title: United Kingdom Flag Watch Face
summary: Flag of United Kingdom! Take your best flag with you and let's drink tea
description: Watch face of the flag of the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland is the best Watch Face ever! Just download this watch face and you will always have your favourite flag showing the time on your hand! The flag design is made in material design style so you will be fashionable and modern, like everyone in England! Britain Hooray!Features:•  beautiful and modern design.•  working perfectly on both round and square watches. •  you can see your favourite flag perfectly designed in ambient and ambient low bit modes.•  compatible with most popular smartwatches: Moto 360, LG G Watch R, LG G Watch, Sony Smartwatch 3, Samsung Gear Live, Asus ZenWatch, LG Watch Urbane and many others.
descriptionHTML:
Watch face of the flag of the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland is the best Watch Face ever! Just download this watch face and you will always have your favourite flag showing the time on your hand! The flag design is made in material design style so you will be fashionable and modern, like everyone in England! Britain Hooray!

Features:
•  beautiful and modern design.
•  working perfectly on both round and square watches.
•  you can see your favourite flag perfectly designed in ambient and ambient low bit modes.
•  compatible with most popular smartwatches: Moto 360, LG G Watch R, LG G Watch, Sony Smartwatch 3, Samsung Gear Live, Asus ZenWatch, LG Watch Urbane and many others.
comments: No 12hr clock option I'm sure how difficult it is seem like a No Brainer then again I'm not developer... uninstall until 12hr clock is available
No date display Looks great, but no option to display date as well as time.
